heroTitle: Buy and sell with ease, direct communication without intermediary
heroDescription: Souq Al Balad app is an easy and secure classifieds platform that directly connects sellers with buyers across the country
feature1: Post your ad in a minute

featuresSection.title: Souq Al Balad Features
featuresSection.description: Discover how Souq Al Balad app makes buying and selling faster and more convenient for you

feature1.title: Post your ad in a minute
feature1.description: Take a photo of the item you want to sell, add the price and some simple details, then publish your ad with one click. The process takes no more than a minute to start attracting buyers!

feature2.title: Instant in-app chat
feature2.description: Enjoy an instant messaging system within the app that allows you to communicate directly and securely with sellers and buyers. Ask, negotiate, and agree easily without sharing your personal data

feature3.title: Simple and easy-to-use design
feature3.description: A carefully designed interface suitable for everyone, regardless of their experience with apps. Easy browsing and clear steps for an enjoyable and smooth buying and selling experience

feature4.title: Premium ads support
feature4.description: Add a professional touch to your ad by featuring it to appear at the top of search results and on home pages, increasing its visibility and chances of selling faster

feature5.title: Dashboard for merchants
feature5.description: If you're a professional merchant or run a small store, you'll get a complete dashboard to manage your ads, track your sales, and communicate with customers easily and effectively, all in one place

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Souq Al Balad is a classifieds app that helps users in Syria to buy and sell products and services easily, without intermediaries. The app is fully designed in Arabic, with a simple, secure interface suitable for everyone. From selling a car or renting a property to posting a job or offering a service - Souq Al Balad is your first platform.
aboutUs.teamDescription: We are a team of developers and designers based in Switzerland and Germany, with extensive experience in using global buying and selling platforms. Through our experience, we noticed the absence of a professional local platform in Syria, so we decided to transfer this idea and develop an application that suits the Syrian market with global quality and technologies.

whyUs.title: Why Souq Al Balad?
whyUs.description: A locally designed app, with high quality, without complexity, and gives users the freedom to communicate, buy and sell. We don't take commissions, nor do we interfere between users - we only give you the tools you need.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the first platform for classified ads in Syria, with an easy and professional digital approach.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide a simple and secure means of direct communication between seller and buyer, without commission or intermediary.

contact.title: We're here to help you
contact.description: If you have any inquiry, problem or suggestion, do not hesitate to contact us. You will be replied to as soon as possible.
